text: Mirna Doris (28 September 1940 – 27 March 2020) was an Italian Canzone Napoletana singer. She was mainly successful in the second half of the 1960s. Doris was born in Naples. Between 1963 and 1970 Doris entered the main competition at the Festival di Napoli, winning the competition in 1968 and in 1969 with the songs "Core spezzato" and "Preghiera a 'na mamma". Doris died in Naples on 27 March 2020 of heart failure caused by diabetes, aged 79.Mirna Doris è morta, l'annuncio della clinica: la regina della canzone napoletana stroncata da un cancro ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Deaths from diabetes Category:Singers from Naples Category:Italian pop singers Category:2020 deaths
title: Mirna Doris
